mapper.select: SELECT a.CMMNTY_ID AS "cmmntyId" , a.CMMNTY_NM AS "cmmntyNm" , a.USE_AT AS "useAt" , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID AS "frstRegisterId" , b.USER_NM AS "frstRegisterNm" FROM COMTN_CMMNTY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM001') c ON a.REGIST_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY CMMNTY_NM
SELECT CMMNTY_ID AS "cmmntyId" , CMMNTY_NM AS "cmmntyNm" FROM COMTN_CMMNTY WHERE USE_AT = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(a.CMMNTY_ID) FROM COMTN_CMMNTY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM001') c ON a.REGIST_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND a.CMMNTY_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT a.CMMNTY_ID , a.CMMNTY_NM , a.CMMNTY_INTRCN , a.USE_AT , a.MEMBER_AT , a.HOME_URL , c.TMPLAT_ID , c.TMPLAT_NM , c.TMPLAT_COURS , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS "frstRegisterNm" , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , a.CMMNTY_LOGO_IMAGE , a.ADDITIONAL_INFO FROM COMTN_CMMNTY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_TMPLAT_INFO c ON a.TMPLAT_ID = c.TMPLAT_ID WHERE a.CMMNTY_ID = #{cmmntyId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTN_CMMNTY SET USE_AT = 'N' , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = now() WHERE CMMNTY_ID = #{cmmntyId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , A.MENU_KNM AS "menuKnm" , A.MENU_POS AS "menuPos" , A.DIRECT_URL AS "directUrl" , (SELECT B.URL FROM COMTN_PROGRM_LIST B WHERE A.PROGRM_FILE_NM = B.PROGRM_FILE_NM ) AS "programURL" FROM COMTN_CMMNTY_MENU A WHERE A.TRGET_ID = #{cmmntyId} AND A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.MGR_AT = 'N' AND A.TOPMENU_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY A.MENU_POS ASC

SELECT A.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , A.MENU_KNM AS "menuKnm" , A.MENU_POS AS "menuPos" , A.DIRECT_URL AS "directUrl" , (SELECT B.URL FROM COMTN_PROGRM_LIST B WHERE A.PROGRM_FILE_NM = B.PROGRM_FILE_NM ) AS "programURL" FROM COMTN_CMMNTY_MENU A WHERE A.TRGET_ID = #{cmmntyId} AND A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.MGR_AT = 'Y' AND A.TOPMENU_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY A.MENU_POS ASC

SELECT A.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , A.MENU_KNM AS "menuKnm" , A.MENU_POS AS "menuPos" , A.DIRECT_URL AS "directUrl" , (SELECT B.URL FROM COMTN_PROGRM_LIST B WHERE A.PROGRM_FILE_NM = B.PROGRM_FILE_NM ) AS "programURL" FROM COMTN_CMMNTY_MENU A WHERE A.TRGET_ID = #{trgetId} AND A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.MENU_POS LIKE #{menuPos}||'%' ORDER BY A.MENU_POS ASC

SELECT a.EMPLYR_ID AS "emplyrId" , b.USER_NM AS "emplyrNm" FROM COMTN_CMMNTY_USER a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.EMPLYR_ID = b.USER_ID WHERE a.CMMNTY_ID = #{cmmntyId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND a.MNGR_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTN_CMMNTY_USER SET USE_AT = 'N' , MNGR_AT = 'N' , SECSN_DE = #secsnDe# , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = now() WHERE CMMNTY_ID = #{cmmntyId} AND USE_AT = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT b.TMPLAT_COURS FROM COMTN_CMMNTY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_TMPLAT_INFO b ON a.TMPLAT_ID = b.TMPLAT_ID WHERE a.CMMNTY_ID = #{cmmntyId}
SELECT b.BBS_ID AS "bbsId" , b.BBS_NM AS "bbsNm" FROM COMTN_BBS_USE a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_BBS_MASTER b ON a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID WHERE a.TRGET_ID = #{cmmntyId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
